name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Actility
description: This is a repository of actility APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Actility
apis.description: Actility is the leader in low power wide area (LoRaWAN and 3GPP) network connectivity management for the Internet of Things: the ThingPark platform
